fieldUpdates.description: Update Sailor Full Name based on values in First and Last Name
fieldUpdates.formula: First_Name__c & IF(Middle_Name__c != null, " " & Middle_Name__c & " ", " ") & Last_Name__c & IF(Suffix__c != null, ", " & Suffix__c, null)
fieldUpdates.name: Update Sailor Full Name

rules.description: Populates Sailor Full Name based on First/Middle/Last Name + Suffix on create and edit
rules.formula: OR(ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(Name), ISCHANGED(First_Name__c), ISCHANGED(Last_Name__c), ISCHANGED(Middle_Name__c) , ISCHANGED(Suffix__c) )
